price: Àti pé báyẹn ni ọ̀rọ̀ Olúwa rẹ ṣe kò lórí àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ pé: “Dájúdájú àwọn ni èrò inú Iná.”
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
